Description: Spacious third floor one-bedroom apartment with new floors and a fresh coat of paint! Located in the Central Square neighborhood of East Boston. 5 minute walk to Maverick T stop. In close proximity to Shaw's supermarket, restaurants, and other shops. Only a few blocks from the airport. - Includes heat and hot water! - 12-month lease - Due at lease signing: First month, last month & security deposit, 1/2 month broker fee - Cats and small dogs are allowed per owner approval (breed restrictions apply), $50 per month additional rent for cats, $100 per month for dogs
